name: Don't Let Go
description: After a man's family dies in what appears to be a murder, he gets a phone call from one of the dead, his niece. He's not sure if she's a ghost or if he's going mad, but as it turns out, he's not.

review.author: Just-A-Girl-14
review.heading: Good thriller
review.reviewBody: I love me a good time twist thriller. It's a fast paced thriller with good cast. It was both suspenseful and emotional. I actually watched it expecting to see a horror movie (which it's not). Some parts don't make a lot of sense (or maybe I just didn't get it) but it's a fun watch!

keywords: psychotronic film,blood,smartphone,evidence,phone call from beyond the grave
